name: Save the Girl (itch)
description:
This is a 2d game you will play as man who has taken up the  himself responsibility of protecting and taking the lost girl safely to her family during a terrorist attack.

Story:- One day a city was attacked by terrorists to fulfill their demands. During this hassle, a girl was separated from her parents. A man sees the girl wandering around and out of humanity decides to take her to his home safely protecting her from all the terrorists. coincidentally the terrorists have hijacked the path towards the mans home. since the man is unarmed he decides to pick up a few stones and move towards a life threatening mission.
